name: My Granny's Cookie
description:
Project Name: My Granny's Cookie

Team Name: Solver

Purpose: To help dementia patients improve their memory and cognitive abillity.

Genre: 2D cooking simulation game.

Description: In this game, player become a grandmother who have to prepare some snacks for her grandchildren.

Player makes some cookies in folllowing a specific order. In this sequence,dementia patients can improve their cognitive abillity and memory.

This game consists of 5 Steps.

1. Put some ingredients for cookies' dough(Drag and Drop)

2. Stir the dough(Using Scroll bar)

3. Pour the dough into the mold. (Cilck the hole)

4. Cook the dough using a oven (Click the oven)

5. Plating the cookies (Drag and Drop)

We make sure this game gets work to Rehabilitating of dementia patients.
